dialogue.text: Did you see him, Owen? As soon as I get near the bowl, he starts going '[woof]' behind the door!

dialogue.speaker: Owen
dialogue.text: Oh yeah, it's true he's really on guard, that one.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I wonder what's making him so nervous today.

dialogue.speaker: Owen
dialogue.text: With this wind outside, he must be sensing all sorts of things he can't figure out.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I'll set the bowl down very gently, that should help.

dialogue.speaker: Owen
dialogue.text: Go ahead, I'll stay near him in case he decides to come take a look.

meaning: bruit du roucoulement de la tourterelle, de la colombe.
bruit du cri du furet.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: This bench, under the old linden tree, is really the best spot to read in the shade.

dialogue.speaker: Mamadou
dialogue.text: Yeah, and there are always those little sounds around. It almost feels like the garden is breathing.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Listen, behind us... [coo coo], [coo coo], do you hear that calm rhythm?

dialogue.speaker: Mamadou
dialogue.text: I've noticed it for a while now, it keeps me company every time I think here.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: That sound has become my little signature for relaxed afternoons in the park.

dialogue.speaker: Mamadou
dialogue.text: To think that all you have to do is close your eyes and the whole scene changes on its own…

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: It feels like spring has really settled in; even the air seems lighter here.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Did you notice how it hums under the trees? There's an incredible life just above us.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Yes, that's true... And there are sounds you don't hear anywhere else, it's fascinating.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Look, over there on the branch. It's all huddled up.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Ah, there it is, I hear it again: [coo-coo]... Listen to how enveloping it is!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: I love it, it almost makes me want to whisper so I don't disturb the atmosphere.

meaning: bruit de grognement ou de rugissement.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: With that giant sign, there's no way we can miss the big cats' alley, don't you think?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Oh, look at that huge lion lying over there, he looks like he's watching everyone like a boss.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Honestly, just looking at his face, you can see why he impresses all the other animals.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: He's starting to get up... I always feel like he's suddenly going to come right up to the glass.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: And there you go, just as you said it, he lets out a huge "[roar]" that makes everyone jump!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I think my heart stopped for a second, I've got chills!

dialogue.speaker: Maelle
dialogue.text: Wait, didn't that make you jump, what just dashed off into the bushes?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Oh yes, and I thought I heard something weird, like [rustle], [rustle], right behind that old log!

dialogue.speaker: Maelle
dialogue.text: It's giving me goosebumps, honestly... Can you imagine if it's that curious fox from yesterday again?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Let's hope it doesn't decide to check if our bags are edible.

dialogue.speaker: Maelle
dialogue.text: I'm warning you, at the slightest suspicious noise, I'm climbing the nearest tree!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Great, you'll just leave me with my untied shoelaces in the middle of the path, huh!

meaning: bruit d'un soupir d'impatience, de lassitude, de compassion.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Another day running around everywhere, and in the end, nothing went as planned!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: You remind me of yesterday—I tried to take care of three simple things, and ended up with twice as many files to handle.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It seems like the more we try to get organized, the more complicated things get. It's crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: It's amazing how the slightest unexpected thing can throw everything off, even with lists and alarms everywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Sometimes I just want to drop everything, but oh well…

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: [ugh]... it feels like this struggle has become the norm, we really need to find a trick.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I feel like the clock stopped on purpose today.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: I swear, you could almost take a nap on this chair, nothing is happening at all.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: To think my gym bag has been waiting for hours in the locker room…

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: The room must be empty by now, we’ll end up going there just to turn the lights back on!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [grumble]… If only there was something to snack on, it would be easier.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: I have a granola bar at the bottom of the drawer, but it must be from before the lockdown…

meaning: bruit d'un soupir d'impatience, de lassitude, de compassion.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: This can't be happening, look at the board again, the train listed doesn't even have a platform assigned...

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: I've already checked three times, there's no way to get clear info! They could at least let us know.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It's like they enjoy messing with us. If this keeps up, I'm going to end up missing everything.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: I was in the same situation last week, remember? Everyone was piling up on the platform, still nothing in sight.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [ugh]... it just makes you want to sit on the floor and wait for time to pass.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Hey, if you want, I'll trade you a snack for a bit of patience, sometimes it helps.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: When I opened my fridge this morning, there was nothing left, even the milk had gone bad.

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: Honestly, with the week you've just had, this is just the icing on the cake!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I swear, between the breakdowns at work and this, it's hard to see the light at the end of the tunnel.

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: If you need anything, I can bring you something tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Thanks Luc, but it's starting to be a bit much... even my cat is giving me dirty looks!

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: [ugh], seriously, it's inhuman, everything that's happening to you right now.

meaning: bruit de ronflement d'un dormeur.
bruit de grognement ou de rugissement.
bruit de ronflement d'un moteur.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I barely slept a wink, you can't imagine the racket.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Really? I didn't hear a thing, I slept like a baby.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Well, every time I was about to fall asleep, I heard that '[zzz]' infernal noise echoing in the room.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Oh no, that must have been annoying... I hope it wasn't me.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I don't know, but it was impossible to ignore!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Next time, I promise I'll check if I make any noise while sleeping.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: My night was a real adventure, I thought my bed was going to take off!

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Another nighttime episode worthy of a movie at your place? Tell me!

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: Would you believe there was a strange racket in the room next door, I couldn't focus on my dreams at all.

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Oh, yes, at one point, I also heard that famous "[zzz] [zzz] [zzz]" coming through the wall, it was almost hypnotic.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: It's crazy how a simple sound can transport you somewhere else... except to sleep.

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: The next expedition is to the merchant of silence, I'm coming with you!

meaning: bruit produit par une forte expiration.
bruit d'un fluide ou d'une mèche qui fuse.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Another meeting that went around in circles—I feel like I ran everywhere for nothing today!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Oh, sounds like a marathon day... Did you make it through in one piece at least?

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Barely! Even my coffee couldn't get me back on my feet this afternoon.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Come on, go sit down, I'll bring you a glass of sparkling water—it'll be a nice change from coffee.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: [sip]... It's amazing how you can feel the tension melt away with a cool sip.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: You should turn into a bubble, with how much you soak up in a day!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [phew]... I thought I'd never make it to the top with all these groceries to carry!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: No kidding, I saw you struggling from the second floor.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: At one point, I almost dropped everything!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Luckily, everything's still intact. Need a hand putting things away?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Gladly... especially with the bag that feels like it's made of lead.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Come on, we'll get it done together, I promise!

meaning: bruit soudain et sec d'un déclic ou d'un coup, notamment d'un coup de fouet.
pour marquer une ablation brutale ou une mort violente, notamment par décapitation.
pour exprimer la soudaineté d'un procès.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: If you hold the ladder straight, I can try to open the hatch.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Go ahead, I won't move, but be quick, I think it's a bit stuck.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: I'm going slowly, I can feel the handle is stiff.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Wait… [clack]! Did you get it open or did it just startle me?

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: The hatch finally opened, it fell all at once!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: You could say it really didn't want to budge!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Do you think we can still open this old chest or is it going to stay stuck forever?

dialogue.speaker: Marion
dialogue.text: Watch me… I turn the key and… [clack]! Well, that wasn't supposed to happen, did you see that?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I almost jumped, what suspense with this thing!

dialogue.speaker: Marion
dialogue.text: Alright, let's see what it's been hiding all this time, it feels like we're opening a treasure.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: If I find an old love letter in there, it's going in my collection, okay?

dialogue.speaker: Marion
dialogue.text: Promise, I'll settle for the gold coins… if there are any!

meaning: bruit soudain et sec d'un déclic ou d'un coup, notamment d'un coup de fouet.
pour marquer une ablation brutale ou une mort violente, notamment par décapitation.
pour exprimer la soudaineté d'un procès.

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: Wait, I'll force it a bit and... [clack]! You didn't see that little trick coming, did you?

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: You almost made me jump, I thought everything was going to break all of a sudden!

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: No worries, it's sturdy; look, it holds up better than my old wardrobe!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: If you keep this up, you'll convince me to call you every time I have something to assemble.

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: With me, you get express assembly, thrills included!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Is the next step the squeaky chair or the stubborn drawer?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: See, the toolbox was bound to come in handy someday. I'm going to try opening this old padlock.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Oh, did you hear that little '[click]'? It popped open all at once!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: That almost made me jump—it held out until the very end.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: With a noise like that, I was ready to see a hidden treasure behind it!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Alright, moment of truth... let's see what's inside this locker.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I hope we don't just find some old socks in there!

meaning: bruit produit par un coup violent.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Hey, there's a pane missing from the garage door! What happened?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I was trying to shoot the ball into the basket, but it went off course... and [crash], the pane couldn't take it!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: That explains the little shards everywhere... I hope you didn't hurt yourself?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: No, luckily, I just managed to step back before everything fell.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: That ball has become a real weapon in your hands!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I think it's going to end up in the attic for a while, that one.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Laurent, did you see what happened in the street? Right in front of the bakery, the crate fell off the truck and [thud], everyone stopped dead in their tracks!

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: Oh, I was at the florist at that moment. People must have jumped anyway.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: You bet! The baker even ran outside, thinking someone had hit his shop window.

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: I'm not surprised, those crates are never tied down properly. It looks like a scene from the Saturday market.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: The driver had a look on his face, he didn't dare move. I thought he was going to disappear behind his steering wheel!

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: With all this commotion, no one cares about the fresh bread anymore... Now that's a lively morning, just the way we like it!

meaning: bruit soudain et sec d'un déclic ou d'un coup, notamment d'un coup de fouet.
pour marquer une ablation brutale ou une mort violente, notamment par décapitation.
pour exprimer la soudaineté d'un procès.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I was putting the shelf together and suddenly, the screw just wouldn’t go any further, there was this weird resistance.

dialogue.speaker: Émilie
dialogue.text: Oh yeah, that reminds me of the other day: I tightened the handle a bit too much and then, [crack], everyone in the room turned around!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Moments like that, you wonder if you broke everything without realizing it!

dialogue.speaker: Émilie
dialogue.text: So true! And then we pretend everything’s under control while secretly checking if it’s all still holding together.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Exactly, I snuck a look behind the shelf so no one would see me.

dialogue.speaker: Émilie
dialogue.text: Shows you, DIY is full of suspense too!

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: This box just won't open, it's resisting me like never before!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Hand it over, I have hidden muscles when it comes to chocolate.

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: Get ready, I'm going to pull one more time... [thud]! Oops, that popped open all at once.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Well, you sure don't do things halfway! Now there's caramel on the table.

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: Let's just say that's proof you had to insist a little...

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: As long as you don't set off the alarm, we're doing fine!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Look at this, I invented a neon green smoothie, worthy of a chemistry lab!

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: Ooh, it looks bold... Are you sure it's safe to drink?

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: I promise, it's 100% edible. Will you trust me and taste it before judging?

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: Alright, I'll give it a try... but if I turn green too, it'll be your fault!

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Hmm, it's surprising at first, but it's actually pretty good!

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: If you survive, I'm up for the neon green challenge too!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Look what I have left: a caramel dessert cream just the way you like it.

dialogue.speaker: Benoît
dialogue.text: Ah, you really know how to speak to my stomach. I was just thinking about a little sweet treat.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Here, help yourself with the spoon, but be careful, it's super smooth.

dialogue.speaker: Benoît
dialogue.text: It's true, it just slides right off... It's almost like a caramel cloud!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Oops, maybe I sucked it up a bit too fast...

dialogue.speaker: Benoît
dialogue.text: That technique deserves an award: sound effects included. Makes me want to try it too!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Have you ever tasted a mousse as light as this one? I feel like I'm eating a cloud.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: The texture is crazy, but look, there's still some left at the very bottom. How do you get to that?

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: (she tilts her glass and slides the spoon in) Careful, special technique… [slurp]! There you go, nothing gets past me.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: You brought out the big guns, you look like a chef on a mission!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: You do what you have to—when it comes to treats, there's no waiting.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Hold on, I'm trying your method before the mousse disappears!

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: If you knew how much time I spent simmering this creamy soup, tell me what you think!

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: Oh, you deserve a medal, it's really smooth and a bit spicy, right?

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: Exactly, I added a hint of ginger. Try another spoonful, you'll see.

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Mmm, now that's truly comforting!

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: You're competing with the orchestra of rain on the windows, Luc!

dialogue.speaker: Luc
dialogue.text: Ah, with a soup like this, I can handle the brass section no problem!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Look at this bowl of ramen—the steam rising from it really makes you want to dive right in!

dialogue.speaker: Romain
dialogue.text: Seriously, I feel like the noodles are going to escape if we wait too long!

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Next time, we'll get the marinated eggs too, I promise. It smells so good.

dialogue.speaker: Romain
dialogue.text: Ah, you always want to try everything! But right now, I can't wait any longer—I'm digging in.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Same here, get ready to have broth all over your cheeks!

dialogue.speaker: Romain
dialogue.text: [slurp]! Hmm, it was really worth braving the line—this broth is amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Nina
dialogue.text: *[slurp]*... Nothing like a good spoonful of creamy soup after a day like this!

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: You can tell you're really putting your heart into it, it's great to see!

dialogue.speaker: Nina
dialogue.text: When the weather is gloomy, you have to find other ways to warm up.

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: Is this creamy soup your Sunday specialty?

dialogue.speaker: Nina
dialogue.text: Absolutely, and I bet it would lift your spirits in no time.

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: As long as you're willing to share the pot, I'm in without hesitation!

meaning: bruit d'une chute, d'un coup, d'un choc brutal.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: And then, I'm walking along the pool, I slip on a wet towel… [splat], my goggles flew farther than I did!

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: You're kidding, you could be an Olympic diver, seriously!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: My ego stayed on the tiles, that's for sure.

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: At least you'll have a splashy story to tell tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Yeah right, it's the towel I'm going to pin on the suspects board.

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: Good one! Next episode: the mystery locker room investigation.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: You know, with all these different glasses in the cupboard, I get lost every time.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: If I were you, I’d take the big one with red polka dots, it’s the sturdiest.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Good idea… Oh, shoot, it’s stuck behind the coffee maker, hold on...

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: There’s something moving in there, do you need a hand or have you got it?

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: No, it’s fine… Well, until the bowl decides to go [splat] on the counter.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: As agile as ever, Nadia! This kitchen hasn’t seen the last of your antics.

meaning: petit bruit de couinement produit par un objet manufacturé.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [squeak]... There, I knew that door would act up again at the worst possible moment.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Does it happen to you in the middle of the night too? It’s like it has a mind of its own!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Of course, especially when I’m trying not to wake anyone up. That piece of furniture is a real mischievous accomplice.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: At my place, it’s the old kitchen drawer. It always makes itself known whenever I want a spoon.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Maybe our furniture is organizing a noise festival, who knows?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: If I ever see a poster in the living room, I’ll know who put it up!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Looks like this meeting is going to drag on and, of course, my chair has decided to act up.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: Does that happen to you often, or is it just today that it's refusing to cooperate?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Listen, every time I change position: [squeak]! There you go, I feel all eyes on me.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: It almost gives the presentation a beat, you should ask for a solo.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: With my talent, I'll end up as the conductor of squeaky chairs.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: You know, I'll lend you mine if yours starts sounding like the neighborhood marching band!

meaning: bruit d'un aliment qui crauqe sous la dent.
bruit de froissement de certains tissus.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Here, try one of these crackers. I bet you've never tasted any this thin before.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: They look pretty unique, with all those seeds on top. I'm definitely tempted, thanks!

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: They're homemade, so be forgiving if you find any surprises when you bite in.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Oh, challenge accepted, I'm expecting something surprising then. No pressure!

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: [crunch]... See, even the sound is unique, it's almost musical!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: We should patent your recipes and their unexpected effects, I think you've invented a new kind of appetizer!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: You don’t come across wafers like these every day, do you?

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: (bites into a wafer) [crunch]… Oh, this one really has a little surprise effect, I approve!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: See, just leaving them on the table makes you want to grab another one.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: And that vanilla flavor, honestly, it puts you in a good mood.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It’s official, these wafers deserve a standing ovation!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: If we had to pick snack of the week, I think we’ve got a winner.

meaning: bruit soudain et sec d'un déclic ou d'un coup, notamment d'un coup de fouet.
pour marquer une ablation brutale ou une mort violente, notamment par décapitation.
pour exprimer la soudaineté d'un procès.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Did you hear that [snap] when I closed the box? It sounded like a whip crack!

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: Yeah, it startled me! You went a bit hard on it, didn't you?

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: The lock was stuck, so I had to force it a little.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: As long as you don't break anything... It's the box with important papers, after all.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: I promise, I'll be more careful next time.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: Thanks, because my heart almost skipped a beat!

dialogue.speaker: Yasmine
dialogue.text: Look, the board won't stay in place, can you push a bit more on your side?

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: I'm pressing with all my strength, but it's slipping, it's burning my hands!

dialogue.speaker: Yasmine
dialogue.text: Wait, I'm wedging the screwdriver between the boards... Can you feel it moving?

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: Oh wow, it's starting to get tight, if it gives way, I hope you don't take it all on your foot!

dialogue.speaker: Yasmine
dialogue.text: Come on, we're almost there, get ready, I'm going to turn it all at once!

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: Oh! That made a real [snap], I felt the vibration all the way up my arm!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Look at that texture, it almost looks like cream! Do you think I put in too much?

dialogue.speaker: Michael
dialogue.text: Honestly, judging by the color, this is going to be good. Can you give me a nice big ladleful?

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Grab your bowl, I'm warning you, it just came out of the pot.

dialogue.speaker: Michael
dialogue.text: Thanks, chef! I can't decide if I should dig in right away or wait a bit... The smell is just too tempting.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Do whatever you feel like, but it would be a shame not to enjoy it while it's nice and hot!

dialogue.speaker: Michael
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Hmm, you know I could finish the whole pot by myself?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Hey, look at the pumpkin soup! It looks like pure silk in the bowl—have you ever seen a color like that?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It really does shine, it’s like we’re about to eat sunshine with a spoon!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Honestly, the first bite is so smooth, almost melting... it’s like a little autumn cloud.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: You’ve made me want some, I have to try it too, hang on a second...

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Oh wow, did you hear that? My spoon practically sang!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It’s impossible to stay serious with you, even the soup is putting on a show!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Careful, the soup is still piping hot, but it fills the whole kitchen with its aroma!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It smells so good I forgot it was cold outside.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Alright, first spoonful for me... [slurp]... Oh wow, the carrots really gave all their flavor.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With a reaction like that, I guess you’re not letting me have the pot?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: We can negotiate, but you’ll see, this creamy soup is worth all the cushions on the couch.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Challenge accepted! Get ready to share this masterpiece.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Look at this bowl of homemade soup, it's just waiting for me after this long rainy day.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Oh, you’re making me jealous… I can smell it from here, it smells amazing!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: With some fresh bread on the side, it’s pure comfort incarnate.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Honestly, I’d totally steal a spoonful if you look away.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Mmm… [slurp]… I’m warning you, one spoonful and you might end up finishing it all!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Challenge accepted, watch out for your soup, it’s not safe anymore!

meaning: bruit produit par l'aspiration d'un liquide ou d'un aliment semi-liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Apparently this cream is amazing, ready to try it with me?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Just the color makes you want it… *[slurp]* Wow, do you taste that hint of vanilla?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Your face says it all, is it really that good?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Honestly, you'll regret not having a second spoonful.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Okay, the temptation is too strong, I'm going for it too!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: We could almost make this our new ritual, don't you think?

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: You know what? I found a smoothie bar right next to the office, they make incredible mixes.

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: Really? That’s perfect, I was just craving something fresh. Which one did you get?

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: The mango-passion one, the color is amazing, look! Want to try?

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: Absolutely, it looks so good. Hand me the straw, I’ll taste it.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: Go easy, it’s really thick, you might be surprised!

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Oh, the texture is perfect, you were right.

meaning: Bruit que fait l'aspiration d'un liquide.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Don't you think the vanilla ice cream tastes a bit different today?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Yeah, it's creamier than usual, isn't it!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Wait, let me taste again... [slurp]... Yes, it's really smooth, I can confirm!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: When you make that sound, it means you're really enjoying it.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Of course! This ice cream shop deserves a medal.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: We should come back every week, don't you think?

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: I bet my hot chocolate is creamier than yours!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Oh, really? Want to have a contest for the best foam?

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: *[slurp]* Mmm, hear that? That's the sound of victory.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: I see you're using techniques worthy of the greatest experts.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Nothing beats a good live demonstration. Your turn!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Get ready, the next round is going to be intense!

meaning: bruit de baiser.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Here, come closer so I can catch you… [smooch], that's to help you survive your marathon day!

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: With a welcome like that, all my tiredness just disappears.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: I hope the boss didn't complain too much, you had that little frown earlier.

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: Oh, he tried, but I had your voice in my head to put things in perspective.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Looks like my magic potion worked, then.

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: In any case, it should be patented—I feel ready to tell you everything.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Look who’s walking around my neighborhood! What a surprise.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: I was hoping I’d run into you—this place just feels happier whenever you’re here.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Clever, you really know how to play with words. Are you hiding a request behind that smile?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Maybe I am... I was thinking a quick hug would help me have a better day.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Well, you sure know how to melt my heart... come here!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: *[smooch]* There we go, mission accomplished!

meaning: Bruit d'un baiser sonore.
Ce baiser.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: If you leave me to finish the dishes all by myself, the kitchen is going to turn into a battlefield!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: But I promised Paul we'd go running, remember?

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Alright, you win... But you'll have to pay a little tribute before you dash off.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: A tribute? I can already guess what it is...

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: (She leans in) [mwah]! There you go, you're free to go for your run.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With that, I bet I'll beat my record today!

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Look at that smile—you look like you just won the lottery!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: You’re exaggerating… but I have to admit, it’s nice to see your face again.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: I knew it would warm your heart—you never resist my little gestures.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: *[mwah]* There you go, to brighten your day!

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: And now, everyone’s going to turn and look at us.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: At least they’ll see I haven’t lost my touch.

meaning: Onomatopée (bruit de reniflement).

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Wow, you seem to be carrying quite a cloud over your head today.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It's one of those days where everything I try just goes wrong, you know the type…

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Oof, that sounds rough. Was there something in particular that brought you down like this?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I forgot a super important file this morning, and then I made a fool of myself in front of the whole team.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Oh man… [sniff]… I almost feel bad for you, days like that are really the worst.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Thanks, you're a real ray of sunshine in spite of it all, you know.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Since you arrived, I feel like something's wrong. Am I right?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: I'm trying to pull myself together but… [sniffle]… it's harder than I thought.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I should have noticed sooner that you were going through a tough time.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: It overwhelms me sometimes, you know. There are days when everything just feels too heavy.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Come on, let's go for a walk. Some fresh air might help clear your mind, right?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: That's a good idea, thank you for thinking of me, really.

meaning: bruit d'une chute (dans l'eau), d'un choc brutal, d'un corps qui s'écrase.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Hey Damien, do you feel like taking the plunge from the high platform, or would you rather stay in the sun?

dialogue.speaker: Damien
dialogue.text: You really want me to get a running start in front of everyone? Are you serious?

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: You only live once, show me what you’re made of!

dialogue.speaker: Damien
dialogue.text: Alright, I’m going for it, but you’ll be responsible if I come back with my hair all messed up.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: It’s now or never, everyone’s waiting for you!

dialogue.speaker: Damien
dialogue.text: Here we go… [splash]!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Look at this board—do you think I could jump from the top without chickening out?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: The way you're fidgeting, I wonder if the board or you will shake more!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: No way, I'm just calculating my run-up in my head, that's all.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: You better launch yourself like a rocket, or your legend's going to take a hit!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Watch closely—are you ready to capture the moment?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: And now... [splash]! Bravo, artist, you gave it your all!

meaning: bruit d'une chute, d'un coup, d'un choc brutal.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: If you only knew what happened to me after the match on the muddy field...

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Wait, seriously? Tell me, I saw everyone suddenly burst out laughing!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: I'm chasing the ball, I think I can catch it, and then my foot slips like never before!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: I was right next to you, I heard a huge [splat] just behind me, I turned around and you were unrecognizable!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Mud in my hair, on my face... I couldn't see clearly for a whole minute.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: You won the medal for the best dive of the weekend, that's for sure!

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: Look at that diving board, it really reminds me of the party at the campsite last year!

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Oh man, are you bringing up that story again where everyone stopped to watch you?

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: Yeah, I wanted to show off in front of the teenagers who were filming...

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: I remember the suspense, everyone was holding their breath!

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: And at the most crucial moment, my foot slipped and then... [splat], I landed flat in front of everyone!

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Unbelievable, even the seagulls looked surprised that day!

meaning: bruit d'une chute, d'un coup, d'un choc brutal.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: I bet I can jump over that puddle without getting my sneakers wet.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: You probably forgot how big that puddle is—it looks almost like a lake...

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: No risk, I calculated the trajectory. Watch closely.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Careful, if you miss, I'm not lending you my socks!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Don't worry, it's in the bag. Three, two, one...

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Oh no... [splash]! Even the ducks jumped!

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: Do you feel like trying the next-level skatepark, or do you prefer the chill option?

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: Oh, I'm aiming for the red ramp! Watch closely... and [thud]! I was so close.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: Honestly, you never stop surprising the bystanders, do you! Are you going to try again?

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: I'm hesitating... but if you survived my show, I can go again!

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: I'm getting my phone out to capture your feats this time!

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: Careful, the video might end up in the 'unexpected stunts' category.

meaning: bruit d'une chute (dans l'eau), d'un choc brutal, d'un corps qui s'écrase.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Do you bet that Arnaud is going to miss his jump again, right in front of everyone?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With the path he's taking, this looks like an improvised stunt...

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: And there it is, [splash]! I warned him though, he was aiming too high.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: He’s going to complain for a week again because of his wet clothes.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Serves him right, he loves showing off too much!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: At least he’ll go down in the neighborhood’s legendary dive history.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Did you just see that duck? It landed with a kind of [splash] right next to our feet!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I even felt a few drops, it really made a big entrance!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: My sandwich almost went overboard because of it, can you picture that?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I think it had a target: your picnic must smell better than ours.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Looks like it! If another one dives in like that, I’m standing guard over my plate.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: All we need now is for the seagulls to get involved… We’ll have to eat on the boat, far from the shore!

meaning: bruit d'une chute (dans l'eau), d'un choc brutal, d'un corps qui s'écrase.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Look at that turquoise water—it really makes you want to dive in fully clothed, doesn't it?

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: Tempting, but I still prefer my towel nice and dry. You know me, my style is more laid-back sunbathing!

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Haha, laid-back... but you're one step away from rolling into the pool with that wobbly lounge chair! Watch your cup, especially.

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: And now... oops! [splash]! Well, that's what happens when I listen to your bad vibes...

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: You're breaking records—we've never drowned a coffee quite like that before!

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: If this pool could hand out diplomas, I'd already have a master's in spectacular entrances!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Look at that old dock, it must have seen plenty of daring dives!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: You say that, but you'd go all the way to the end without hesitation, admit it!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: I'm thinking about it... My heart is pounding just at the thought.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: As long as you don't change your mind at the last second, I want to see it!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Alright, it's now or never... one, two, THREE!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: [splash]! Looks like the lake welcomed you very well!

meaning: bruit d'une chute (dans l'eau), d'un choc brutal, d'un corps qui s'écrase.

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: Watch closely, Léa, I bet you’d never dare jump that close to the dock!

dialogue.speaker: Léa
dialogue.text: Careful, Jules... Oops, my feet slipped… [splash]!

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: Wow, Léa, you really put on a show!

dialogue.speaker: Léa
dialogue.text: I swear, this wet floor is a trap!

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: Next time, I’ll lend you my non-slip flip-flops.

dialogue.speaker: Léa
dialogue.text: But keep the camera ready, you might see more!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Look at that puddle—it almost looks like a little pond after the rain!

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: I bet you don't even dare jump in with your new sneakers.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: My sneakers? Not scared at all! Watch out, Mathis, keep your eyes open!

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: Go on, surprise me, but if you slip, it'll be your own fault!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Three, two, one... here we go!

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: Yeah, that's right, act like a star... [splash]! Unmissable, Lea, you just redecorated your sneakers!

meaning: bruit produit par une double gifle.

dialogue.speaker: Melissa
dialogue.text: I just came to get a dessert and then, everything went off the rails right in front of me!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: With you, it's never boring—come on, tell me what you saw!

dialogue.speaker: Melissa
dialogue.text: Well, Chloé suddenly turned toward Sam, and all I heard was a big [splash splosh] right in the middle of the crowd.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Sam's face must have been priceless after that!

dialogue.speaker: Melissa
dialogue.text: I swear, even the forks were left hanging in the air.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I can already picture the scene—that deserves a spot in movie of the year!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: So much for a quiet day… Yesterday at lunch in the cafeteria, everything went off the rails in three seconds!

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: Wait, what could have turned the mood upside down like that?

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Carole and Julien were talking pretty loudly, then their voices started to rise.

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: Oh no, not another drama in front of the lunch trays... And then?

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: All of a sudden, a sudden movement, and then, [splash splatter]… the whole table held its breath!

dialogue.speaker: Laurent
dialogue.text: To think I missed that for a meeting where we just talked about binders… what an injustice!

meaning: pour exprimer une incrédulité, une réticence, une mise en garde, un désaccord; pour signifier une interdiction, un refus; pour coupter la parole à quelqu'un.
pour exprimer l'admiration.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: You know, I feel like trying that new Japanese restaurant at the end of the street tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Oh, you mean the one with the big red lanterns at the entrance?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Exactly! They say their ramen is amazing.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: But it's always packed and apparently really expensive. Are you sure you want to give it a shot?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [tsk]! Come on, you never get anything if you don't try. Let's go—worst case, we'll find something else.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Alright, fine, but if we end up waiting in line for an hour, you get to pick dessert!

dialogue.speaker: Lucie
dialogue.text: Hugo, are you coming with me to the impromptu concert in the park tonight?

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: A concert? But they're forecasting rain, and you know what the park is like at night...

dialogue.speaker: Lucie
dialogue.text: Exactly! There will be fewer people, so we can enjoy the music in peace.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Hmm, I don't know... every time you suggest something last minute, it always turns out epic.

dialogue.speaker: Lucie
dialogue.text: [tsk] You have to live a little, otherwise you never do anything!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Yeah, or end up with soaked feet in the rain... But hey, you've almost convinced me.

meaning: bruit produit par un coup sec, par un choc soudain.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Be careful with that hammer, okay? These DIY projects go fast…

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: Don’t worry, I’m used to it. Watch how I do it.

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Ah, that little '[tap]' we just heard, is that the sign of a job well done?

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: Exactly, it means the nail went in perfectly!

dialogue.speaker: Elise
dialogue.text: Alright, no second 'tap', especially not on your fingers, okay?

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: Promise, I’ll be careful. And just in case, I’ve got the box of bandages nearby!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Are you sure it fits this close to the wall?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Yes, don’t worry, I measured carefully. Hold the shelf, please.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Alright, but go slowly, the screw looks stubborn.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: I’ll give it a little push… and… [pop]!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Ah, you startled me! Good thing you have quick reflexes.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With a bit of noise, things move along faster, don’t you think?

meaning: bruit de battements précipités du cœur, sous le coup de l'essoufflement, de l'émotion.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Wow, did you see how we raced up the stairs, Maxime? I thought we were going to take off.

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: And to think, the whole time I could hear this funny "[thump thump thump] thump thump" in my chest that just wouldn't stop!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I couldn't even talk when we got to the top, that's how bad it was!

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: We almost deserved a medal for how hard we pushed ourselves!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Next time, let's take the elevator. It won't be as epic, but it'll be more relaxing...

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: Deal, but admit it—without those little adrenaline rushes, life would be a lot less fun!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Wait, Zoé, did you see her? That was really her right next to the kiosk!

dialogue.speaker: Zoé
dialogue.text: Yes! She turned her head, I thought my heart was going to explode. Can you imagine if she recognizes us?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I swear, my legs couldn't keep up, we sprinted like crazy down the sidewalk.

dialogue.speaker: Zoé
dialogue.text: When I think about it, we crossed the street without even looking, it was almost reckless!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I feel like I'm going to need several minutes to recover from this…

dialogue.speaker: Zoé
dialogue.text: Oh, forget it, in my chest it's just [thump thump], [thump thump] racing so fast!

meaning: Bruit sec.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Darn, this jar of jam really doesn't want to cooperate today.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Hand it over, let's see if my hands are more convincing than yours.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: You should try with a towel, it's less slippery.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Good idea. I'll take a deep breath...

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: *[pop]* Well, it took all of Thomas's strength!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Breakfast is saved, mission accomplished!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Listen to this, [clink], the coin just fell right between the couch cushions.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Are you on a morning treasure hunt or is it your coin collection scattering again?

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: I promise, it wasn't planned! I got up too quickly and the coins went flying.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: We'll have to call in a detective to find them all—we'll end up finding one under the table in three months again!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Admit it, you enjoy finding hidden coins every time we clean.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Absolutely, it's like an unexpected bonus that motivates me to vacuum.

meaning: bruit d'un tir de mitrailleuse ou de mitraillette.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Hey Marc, do you remember the video game we played yesterday? It was total chaos on the screen!

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: You bet, at one point all I had to do was press the button and it went "[ratatat] [ratatat] [ratatat]" everywhere, I didn't even know where to look anymore!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I was wondering how you managed to stay so calm, I was jumping on my controller every time.

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: It's all about practice, you know me, I treat it like a supercharged game of hide and seek.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Anyway, the next session is going to be even more epic, that's for sure!

dialogue.speaker: Marc
dialogue.text: Get ready, I've found some new tricks to stir up even more mayhem next time.

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: Honestly, I think I almost had a nervous breakdown in front of my screen last night, it was epic.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Wait, was it because of the level with the dark hallways?

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: Exactly that one! I was sneaking around a corner, super focused…

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: And then suddenly, [ratatat] [ratatat] [ratatat], I can totally picture the thing that made you jump!

dialogue.speaker: Nabil
dialogue.text: Busted! I almost dropped the controller, seriously.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Awesome, you should sign up for a tournament with that kind of training!

meaning: bruit d'un tir de mitrailleuse ou de mitraillette.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: I still have the tension from the movie stuck on my shoulders, it really shook me up!

dialogue.speaker: Maëva
dialogue.text: Honestly, that moment when they crawl behind the cars had me frozen in place.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: You mean just before everything goes haywire at the intersection?

dialogue.speaker: Maëva
dialogue.text: Exactly, I jumped like never before, with all that chaos all of a sudden!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: And then those sequences... [ratatat] [ratatat]... my heart just stops for a second!

dialogue.speaker: Maëva
dialogue.text: Yeah, it really felt like we were there, it chilled me to the bone it was so immersive.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Wow, you turned into a machine on that last level! I thought we were all going to get wiped out.

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: I really felt that one... Enemies were popping up from everywhere, I almost dropped the controller.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: You still looked like you had it under control! I saw the screen flashing all over while I was hiding behind crates.

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: At that moment, I just pressed without thinking: [ratatat] [ratatat], shots flying everywhere, I just hoped it would work.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: It really felt like we were there! My heart was almost beating as fast as your pace.

dialogue.speaker: Sébastien
dialogue.text: If it always went that well, we'd already be at the top of the leaderboard!

meaning: bruit produit par un coup sec, par un choc soudain.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Hey, your old shelf doesn't look like it can handle all that weight!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: See how it's leaning? If we put one more dictionary on it, it'll collapse.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Wait, I'll put this board back in place... there we go... *[click]*

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: That almost made me jump! Looks like you used your superhero strength.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Give me five minutes and you'll be able to put your books back, handyman's promise.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I'm watching, but if it starts defying gravity again, I'm calling for help!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Careful, I'm nailing down the first plank, listen closely... [thunk]! There, it echoes through the whole room.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Wow, you really set the tone right away! Looks like you've been doing this forever.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Let's just say I got some practice with the old floor at my parents' place.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: We should hire you for all the projects in the neighborhood!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Let's just try to finish this room without drilling into the walls next door.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Promise, I'll stay focused... And I'll keep my fingers far from the next nails!

meaning: bruit de galop du cheval.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Look at how he takes off, it's like he's flying down the track!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: It's crazy, he seems like he never gets tired, even after several laps.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: His strides are so steady, I could almost sync my breathing to them.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: It makes me want to try a race too, just to see if I can keep up the pace.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Listen, when he passes by the stands, you hear every time: [thud-thud], [thud-thud], it's mesmerizing!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: We really never get tired of it, it's almost hypnotic watching him.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: You’ll never guess—I dreamed again that the meadow stretched out endlessly before me, with horses all around!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Ah, you and your horse dreams! You would have made a perfect rider back in the Wild West.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Totally! At one point, I felt like I could hear [clip-clop] [clip-clop] right behind me, as if the gallop was sweeping me away.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Just listening to you, you can almost feel the dust flying under those imaginary hooves.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: My heart races just thinking back to that feeling of freedom—who knows why.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Sounds like your nights are more exciting than my days, honestly!

meaning: signal sonore au rythme convenu.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: If we want to avoid things going off the rails like last time, we really need to all stay focused on the timing.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Absolutely! I’m already keeping an eye on the clock, but tell me, did you set up a cue this time?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: I thought we’d stick with our usual system—it’s proven itself during the last tests.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Oh, you know, by now it’s almost second nature. I just need to know when it starts.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: You can count on it! As soon as the time comes, everything should fall into place smoothly.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I already have the sound in my head: [da-da dum dum], and boom, everyone’s ready to go!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Alright, the machine is just waiting for us. Are you all set with your headset?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Headset plugged in, mic in place, all I need is your signal and I'm ready to go.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: As usual, I'll start as soon as everything's set up on my end.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: As soon as I hear the famous [ba-dum tss], I'll start—not a second later.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Don't blink, it's going to go fast today!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: I'm all ears, waiting eagerly for the go!

meaning: bruit de galop du cheval.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Oh look, they're all heading to the river together, it's funny how they move as a group!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Listen to that, it sounds like a series of [clip-clop] just behind the hedge, it's almost as rhythmic as a dance.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: We should walk along the fence, I want to watch them even more closely.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Good idea, just stay on the sunny side, we'll see their movements better.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: It's amazing how their pace suddenly changes, you can really feel the tension in the air.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: There's nothing like this show to remind you that the countryside is truly alive every moment!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: I still have sand in my shoes, can you believe it?

dialogue.speaker: Malo
dialogue.text: Tell me about it, I think my jeans will never recover after that trek through the forest.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: At the same time, we didn’t expect that sudden climb—you almost passed me!

dialogue.speaker: Malo
dialogue.text: And you behind me, you started laughing right when it went [clatter] on the old bridge!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Of course, I wasn’t expecting it to shake that much, especially right there.

dialogue.speaker: Malo
dialogue.text: Next time, I’m bringing a camera just to capture your surprised face under the branches!

meaning: bruit de musique forement rythmée.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Do you hear the music coming from downstairs, Julien? It sounds like a party just started.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Yeah, and that beat, you know, that steady [rat-a-tat-tat] that makes you want to drop everything? It gets stuck in my head every time it comes by.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Exactly, it feels like even the walls are vibrating with the sound.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It's tempting to go check it out, isn't it? We'd probably be welcomed right at the half-open door.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: We can stay here for a while and enjoy it, as if we were invited.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Good idea, it'll be our own little private concert just for us.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Did you see the vibe at the concert last night? It was absolutely wild!

dialogue.speaker: Sonia
dialogue.text: I missed it, tell me all about it! I heard the crowd was going crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Totally! At one point, everyone was stomping their feet and it made this incredible [thumpthumpthump] in the room, it was insane.

dialogue.speaker: Sonia
dialogue.text: Oh, you really make me feel like I was there!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: And I haven't even told you about the moment when the lights synced up with the sound system.

dialogue.speaker: Sonia
dialogue.text: Next time, I'll make sure not to miss a thing, I swear!

meaning: bruit de galop du cheval.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: If you had seen my brother's face when he realized we were going horseback riding, it was worth every detour in the world.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Him, who usually prefers bike rides, that must have really shaken things up for him!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Absolutely, he was really out of his element at first. I’ve rarely seen him so focused, especially when the horse started to speed up.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: That makes me want to see it, I really need to make up my mind and try it one day.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Honestly, it’s a unique feeling—the scenery rushing by and the wind brushing against you, you completely lose track of time.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Just imagining you, I can almost hear the ground vibrating under a repeated, catchy [clip-clop], it suddenly feels like you’re somewhere else!

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: I swear, I held my breath the moment the horses circled around us!

dialogue.speaker: Rémi
dialogue.text: The rhythm, the speed, everything felt electrifying—I almost felt dizzy.

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: Next to me, all I could hear was: [clip-clop] [clip-clop], it was like the whole scene was vibrating.

dialogue.speaker: Rémi
dialogue.text: Even my seat was shaking, it felt like we were in an old western in the middle of the desert!

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: It's true, that kind of energy makes you want to gallop yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Rémi
dialogue.text: Can you imagine the training it takes to reach such harmony? It's really impressive.

meaning: bruit de galop du cheval.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Paul, listen to this: [clop clop] [clop clop] [clop clop]... That's exactly what I love to hear when we're walking through the meadows!

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: Ah, you're hopeless with your imitations. Did you spot something or are you just playing around like usual?

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Look over there, there's really some movement near the old barn.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: Wait, I think you just won your bet, something's happening!

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Shall we go take a look? With a bit of luck, we'll get a great show.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: You read my mind, let's go before we miss it!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Something just went past behind the barn, did you hear that?

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: Yeah, it was fast, like the ground was vibrating under our feet.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: I wonder if it’s one of the neighbor’s horses, they escaped last week.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: Or maybe it’s just the wind rolling an old wheelbarrow… But that noise, it’s getting closer.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Look behind the fence, there’s something moving really fast!

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: It’s speeding by like lightning, [clop clop clop]… Impressive, isn’t it?

meaning: bruit d'un tir de mitrailleuse ou de mitraillette.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I thought I was going to lose the point, I could only see shadows moving in the darkness.

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: And then bam, I dove behind the crates, I just heard in my head: [rat-a-tat] rat-a-tat, it was coming from everywhere!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I ducked down all of a sudden, I swear, I almost rolled on the ground I was so surprised.

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: Totally, it felt like an old action movie, without the slow motion but with even more stress.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: It's not every day you end up running like ninjas between the walls!

dialogue.speaker: Omar
dialogue.text: Next time, I'm wearing a red headband, that's for sure.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Last night, I was totally into the game, I thought my controller was going to slip out of my hands!

dialogue.speaker: Mélanie
dialogue.text: I can totally picture it: you’re moving forward carefully, and then suddenly, "[rat-a-tat] [rat-a-tat]", you have to drop everything and hide!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Exactly! I even jumped, my heart was pounding like crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Mélanie
dialogue.text: With that kind of adrenaline, I get why you couldn’t stop before three in the morning.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I swear, it was like I’d just run a sprint… My fingers were clenched until the end!

dialogue.speaker: Mélanie
dialogue.text: It’s official, you deserve the medal for most dedicated player that night!

meaning: bruit sec réitéré, produit notamment par un heurt léger.
bruit produit par le ronflement d'un moteur, par le fonctionnement d'un mécanisme.
bruit des roues d'un train.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: (her pen taps softly against the notebook) [tap tap]... I feel like time has stopped in this waiting room.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I see you're getting impatient; you could almost set the clock's rhythm.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It's hard to sit still when every minute feels like an eternity...

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Hang in there, we're starting to understand the paintings on the walls just by staring at them so much.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Ah, if only they'd changed the exhibit since last time!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: The routine of waiting, improvised art gallery style. One day we'll have to suggest they put on some background music!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: You know, I got my pen stuck under the furniture again—it's the third time today.

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: How do you manage that every time? That pen must really want to hide!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Wait, I'm trying to grab it with a ruler...

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: Oh, I hear a little [tap tap] against the wood, I think you're almost there!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Got it, I can feel it moving—it's at the end of my ruler.

dialogue.speaker: Jules
dialogue.text: That pen really loves adventure, we should buy it a leash!

meaning: bruit sec réitéré, produit notamment par un heurt léger.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: That weird thing making noise again… I just can’t figure out where it’s coming from.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Listen, it’s been going [tap tap], [tap tap] for five minutes, sounds like someone’s tinkering under the floor.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Couldn’t it just be the pipes having fun at midnight?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Or maybe your cat is up to no good behind the door again…

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Betting on the cat is always risky. Should we check together?

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Let’s go, time to solve the mystery—improvised detectives!

dialogue.speaker: Melanie
dialogue.text: Do you feel those little tremors under the floor too? [tap tap], [tap tap]... it's making my socks vibrate!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Oh, you noticed it too? I thought my phone was vibrating earlier, but it wasn't.

dialogue.speaker: Melanie
dialogue.text: I checked, nothing fell in the kitchen and all the appliances are unplugged.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Maybe we should take a look in the basement, you never know with this old house...

dialogue.speaker: Melanie
dialogue.text: If you come with me, I'll grab the flashlight!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Perfect, I'll go first, but if something jumps out, it's every man for himself!

meaning: bruit produit par le ronflement d'un moteur, par le fonctionnement d'un mécanisme.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: You’re not giving up on that moped, are you? Looks like you really want it to run tonight!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I promised my brother we’d go for a ride, but it’s really giving me a hard time today.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: With all the tinkering you’re doing, it’s going to end up winning the perseverance award… So, how’s it looking under there?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Listen, as soon as I turn the key, you hear this kind of [putt putt] repeating, it’s almost hypnotic after a while.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: At least your moped’s got rhythm, even if it doesn’t move much!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Let’s just say it’s warming up, kind of like an artist practicing scales before the big show.

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: Take a look, every time I turn the key, you can hear that famous [thump thump] coming from the hood... that's not normal.

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: It's really not reassuring, especially since we started the day feeling confident.

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: It feels like the car is trying to tell us something with that weird rhythm.

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: It picked its moment, that's for sure... Do you think we should stop here or try to make it to the local garage?

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: I'd feel better if we stopped now, just to take a look before we get an unpleasant surprise.

dialogue.speaker: Amelie
dialogue.text: Perfect, if you handle the hood, I'll get the coffee ready in the passenger seat—now that's teamwork!

meaning: Onomatopée exprimant l'incrédulité, la défiance, le mépris.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: You'll never guess who I saw dancing in the rain at Wilson Square… The high school principal!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: [nuh-uh], do you really think I'm going to swallow something like that? Impossible, it has to be a joke.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I swear it was him, blue raincoat, no umbrella and everything… People stopped to watch!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: If it's true, I want a video, otherwise I'll never believe it.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Too late, I didn't get my phone out in time… Maybe he'll do it again after class, who knows?

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: I'm willing to bet you mistook him for his lookalike, you'll see!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [yeah right], you're not going to make me believe that Luc got that promotion all by himself!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Why not? He's been working hard for months, it's not just luck.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Yeah... Remember last year, he also suddenly 'succeeded' on that project thanks to a big helping hand.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: I remember, but this time, apparently the numbers speak for themselves.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: We'll see, but I'm still skeptical until I see the results.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Alright, let's wait until the end of the week and judge for ourselves, sound good?

meaning: bruits de signaux télégraphiques en morse.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Last night, it was impossible to sleep with all that commotion coming from the living room.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Really? I thought I heard something odd too, but it was too far away.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: It was repetitive, almost like someone was trying to get attention on purpose.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It wasn’t anything to do with the cat or the clock?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: No, it was much stranger, it echoed like: [rat-a-tat ti]... [rat-a-tat ti]… It stuck in my head all night.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it, I almost feel like I’m still there—it’s honestly weird to have those kinds of echoes in our place.

dialogue.speaker: Amelia
dialogue.text: Impossible to forget that room where everyone was hanging on every little sound!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: At the same time, with all those machines lined up on the table, it felt like we were in an old adventure movie!

dialogue.speaker: Amelia
dialogue.text: Did you see when the technician started the demonstration? Suddenly, everything came to life with that '[rat-a-tat]' echoing across the room!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Honestly, I almost got goosebumps from hearing those alternating sounds over and over!

dialogue.speaker: Amelia
dialogue.text: For a moment, I even thought we were getting a secret message just for us.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Next time, I'm bringing my notebook so I can try to jot everything down on the fly!

meaning: bruit de vapeur d'eau.
bruit d'une locomotive à vapeur.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: With this blanket and kettle, we really have everything we need to face a freezing late afternoon!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Ah, listen to that little [pssh]... it sounds like our elixir is getting ready to reveal all its secrets!

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Always fascinated by these rituals, aren't you! The little things captivate you just as much as the aroma of tea.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: It's in these moments that we savor the waiting the most. The hot water already promises comfort.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Since you have such a sharp eye tonight, you get to pick the flavor!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Mint tea, then, so this moment has the freshness of a winter garden.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: Do you want a cup of tea? The kettle is starting to whistle on the stove.

dialogue.speaker: Sophia
dialogue.text: Oh yes, I hear the [pssshh]! That's the sign the water's boiling, it reminds me of afternoons at my grandmother's.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: It's true, that little sound creates such a cozy atmosphere.

dialogue.speaker: Sophia
dialogue.text: What kind of tea are you using today?

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: A jasmine green tea, it's perfect for sharing a quiet moment.

dialogue.speaker: Sophia
dialogue.text: Thank you, Julian. This promises a truly gentle break!

meaning: bruit ponctuel produit par un coup soudain, par un tir d'arme à feu.
bruit d'un coup violent produit par un instrument tranchant.

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Okay, it’s not like on console, I’m actually getting a bit of an adrenaline rush.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: That’s normal, the first time always feels a bit weird. Don’t worry, the hardest part is controlling your breathing.

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Alright, I’m going to focus on the target and lock my legs, just like you told me.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Perfect. Do you feel the trigger under your finger? Let yourself be guided, the pressure should be gradual.

dialogue.speaker: Karim
dialogue.text: Okay, I think everything’s lined up... here I go, no turning back this time.

dialogue.speaker: Vincent
dialogue.text: Come on, show it who’s boss… [click]!

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: Look, I press the trigger and suddenly... [click]! It goes straight into the target, did you see?

dialogue.speaker: Clément
dialogue.text: I didn't think you'd be that accurate on your very first try.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: It was more impressive than I imagined, I felt the adrenaline rush all of a sudden.

dialogue.speaker: Clément
dialogue.text: You can tell by your smile, you really had a blast there.

dialogue.speaker: Hugo
dialogue.text: I admit, it's way more intense than in the videos. I still can't believe it.

dialogue.speaker: Clément
dialogue.text: Wait until you try with moving targets, you'll see what it's like when things start moving in front of you!

meaning: bruit d'une batterie d'orchestre.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: [bam boom]! It was like the floor was shaking when they started that song, even my shoes were vibrating!

dialogue.speaker: Élodie
dialogue.text: No kidding, just thinking about it makes my arms want to start moving again on their own, like I was right there!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: And the singer's smile at that moment—so contagious—I felt like I was floating.

dialogue.speaker: Élodie
dialogue.text: The lights sweeping over the crowd made you want to throw your hands up without even thinking, it was a wave of energy.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: We were all in sync, it's rare to feel so carried by the music.

dialogue.speaker: Élodie
dialogue.text: Next time, I'm starting the first note—deal!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Last night, the old vinyl was spinning at full blast—I almost felt like I was at a festival right in my living room.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Oh yeah? I can already picture the moment when it goes '[thump boom]' and everything takes off, it's unstoppable!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: That's exactly it—it took me straight back to that concert in Lyon, you know, the one where no one could stay seated!

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: That night, even the seats ended up vibrating—I remember it like it was yesterday.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: We should do it again—nothing beats sharing that energy in real life.
