dialogue.text: Did you know they opened a new pizzeria on the corner? Everyone at the office is talking about it.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: [meh], pizza is always the same for me.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Oh, I thought it would change up our usual lunch routine a bit.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Even with new places, these lunches always end up feeling the same.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Well, we'll just improvise again then, like always.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Works for me, at least there's no headache over choosing.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: [meh], you know, the new exhibit downtown didn’t really appeal to me.

dialogue.speaker: Amandine
dialogue.text: Oh really? I went yesterday, it was actually pretty surprising.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I heard there were a lot of people, right?

dialogue.speaker: Amandine
dialogue.text: Yes, but the atmosphere was worth it despite the crowd.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Maybe I should’ve given it a shot after all.

dialogue.speaker: Amandine
dialogue.text: Next time then, we’ll go together!

meaning: Brusque hausse des valeurs, en Bourse.
Croissance soudaine et peu stable.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: The charts are going wild, it's impossible to predict their next move!

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: I have to admit, I've been keeping an eye on my stocks today—the atmosphere is electric.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: It's been a long time since I've seen so much red and green in the same day.

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: In all this commotion, there was that big [boom] that shook up the entire energy sector!

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: You’re telling me! I barely had time to react, it happened so fast.

dialogue.speaker: Theo
dialogue.text: It seems like there are always surprises when the markets go this crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Did you take a look at the charts early this afternoon? It was intense today.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: No, I was in meetings all day. What happened?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Check out Fermatech. There was an announcement and the numbers completely changed.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Oh, it was [boom] right on the screen, everyone was wide-eyed!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: The forum discussions were all about that, everyone wanted to understand this unexpected jump.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: We’ll have to keep an eye on things tomorrow, it looks like this dance is just getting started.

meaning: Exclamation de douleur ou onomatopée imitant le bâillement, l'aboiement

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: Did you bump into the coffee table again? Looks like your ankle took quite a hit.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: [owowow] ! I tried to avoid the cat, but it was either him or me... and clearly, I'm the one who lost again.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: It's like that table is just waiting for the right moment to attack!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Even the cat looks pleased with the outcome, he's staring at me like it was his plan all along.

dialogue.speaker: Elodie
dialogue.text: If you want, I can bring you some ice and a strategic pillow to help you survive.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: With a bit of luck, next time I'll turn into an acrobatic ninja... or not!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [whoa-whoa]! I thought there was still another step, but my feet hit the ground sooner than I expected.

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: You just set a record for the most unusual entrance! Looks like the stairs didn’t go easy on you.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: My shoe even decided to go solo down the stairs—the traitor.

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: I hope that’s not a sign the day is going to throw more wacky surprises at us.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: If it is, I suggest we set up a giant cushion for our next outing.

dialogue.speaker: Maxime
dialogue.text: Or we could all review the distracted employee’s survival manual together!

meaning: Qui reste bouche bée, frappé de stupeur, d'admiration, etc.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Do you know what happened during the match yesterday? It was really something, honestly!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: A surprise? What's the scoop, you're making me curious now!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: The fans started a giant wave and in the middle of it, a kid juggled for so long that the whole stadium was left [stunned].

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: That must have been wild to see, the atmosphere must have given you chills!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Even the players stopped to applaud, it was the icing on the cake!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Next time, you have to drag me along; I don't want to miss something like that!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: You'll never guess what happened in front of the bakery this morning!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Oh, tell me! Something unbelievable again, I bet?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Totally! I saw a dog skateboarding and everyone was [gobsmacked], nobody moved.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: No way, are you kidding? A dog on a skateboard, you only see that in funny videos!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: I swear, I even managed to film it, it was really worth seeing.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: You absolutely have to show me, I can tell I'm going to have a good laugh!

meaning: Parler beaucoup d'une manière enfantine.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Guess what, Lucas spent his whole day telling stories about his daring dinosaur adventures in the living room.

dialogue.speaker: Adrien
dialogue.text: Ah, that reminds me of the pirate stories Maëlle makes up every time she finds a cardboard box!

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: What always amazes me is that nonstop imagination—have you ever seen anything like it?

dialogue.speaker: Adrien
dialogue.text: Absolutely, they can turn any object into a treasure or a magical creature.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: And while jumping all over the place, I hear her [babble] behind the door, making up dialogues for all her stuffed animals.

dialogue.speaker: Adrien
dialogue.text: It gives the house such an amazing atmosphere, it's like a little traveling theater!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It's crazy, yesterday when I was walking past the playroom door, I heard Léo [babbling] near his stuffed animals, it always makes me smile!

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: No kidding, kids really have ways of doing things that sometimes just escape us.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: He crouches down in front of his favorite bear and makes those faces, it's irresistible.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Sometimes, I wish I could understand what's going on in their heads at those moments.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Maybe they're inventing a whole secret world just for themselves, with codes we can't even guess.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: And we're just admiring spectators, that's what makes those moments so precious.

meaning: Gifle.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Do you know what happened to me at the cafeteria today? Thomas dumped his tray right next to mine and the soup splashed all over my report folder.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Wait, did he do it on purpose or is he just all thumbs?

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Honestly, judging by his face, I really think he did it to get back at me for yesterday's meeting...

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: Oh no, but [smack], it's unbelievable how petty someone can be!

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: I just took a deep breath, picked up my folder, and acted like nothing happened.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: You kept your cool, I wouldn't have stayed calm if I were you.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Do you remember last night’s party? Well, while everyone was dancing, suddenly, [smack] right in the middle of the living room between Luc and Thomas, the music stopped dead!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: What? No one saw it coming? That must have killed the mood...

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Everyone turned toward them, even the neighbor from downstairs came up to see what was going on.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Honestly, parties like that almost make me want to never leave my couch again.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: It was like a real movie scene, no one dared to speak for several long seconds.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: If I were you, I’d put my popcorn in the microwave before the next party... Just in case!

meaning: Pépiement d'oiseau.

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: Look at that golden light filtering through the leaves, it feels like we're in a little secret haven.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It's true, it seems like the whole park is taking its time to stretch and wake up.

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: Listen, there's that persistent [chirp-chirp] just up there, I feel like we're being quietly watched.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: They picked a good balcony in that tree, those clever little ones.

dialogue.speaker: Nathalie
dialogue.text: Next time, I'll bring something to leave them a few crumbs, who knows if they'll accept our presence.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: We might end up becoming regulars with the local wildlife, if we keep sharing our morning breaks.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: The bench under the big oak is always free; it seems like no one dares disturb the peace here.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: That's true, even the air feels suspended; you can only hear the gentle rustling of the wind in the branches.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Oh look, on that branch right there! They're hopping from one foot to the other.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: They seem so lively, almost invisible if you don't pay attention.

dialogue.speaker: Chloe
dialogue.text: Listen, [chirp-chirp]... it sounds like they're chatting with each other while pecking.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: Sometimes I wish I could understand what all that tiny commotion is about.

meaning: Cri pour faire aller un cheval à gauche.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Last time, I kept going around in circles with Sultan—I just couldn't get him to change direction!

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: Oh yeah, with him you need a bit of technique. How are you doing with the reins again?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I hold them properly, but I feel like he only listens when he feels like it…

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: That's normal, some horses are stubborn. You can talk to him—it helps get his attention.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: I'd really like to see how you do it, especially when you ask him to switch sides.

dialogue.speaker: Manon
dialogue.text: Watch closely, Lucas: a little flick of the wrist, and most importantly, I give a nice clear '[gee]', you'll see, it never fails!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [snap]! Look Paul, all I have to do is say that and he takes the left path, he reacts instantly.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: It’s impressive how he listens to you. Mine always hesitates a bit when there’s a fork.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It’ll come with time, you’ll see. At first, he used to make mistakes a lot too.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: You think so? I think he just lacks a bit of confidence.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Anyway, this trail is beautiful, especially with this afternoon’s light.

dialogue.speaker: Paul
dialogue.text: Yes, it’s true. It almost feels like we’re in an impressionist painting.

meaning: Onomatopée évoquant le bruit d'une clochette, d'une sonnette.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I tried your apple pie recipe last night, and honestly, everyone went back for seconds!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Oh, that's so nice to hear! Did you add a bit of cinnamon like I suggested?

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Yes, and even a hint of caramel. It gave it a gorgeous golden color.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: You absolutely have to show me how you do that, I'm curious!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [ring ring]... Wait, do you hear that? It's coming from the hallway, right?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Oh no, maybe Luc has already arrived for the surprise dinner...

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: This cake will be ready in two minutes if the oven decides to cooperate.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Oh, [ding] [ding]! There goes the timer joining us in the kitchen—it smells like tasting time is near.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: That's the signal, I'm off to take out the treat before it gets too brown.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: I'm ready to set the table like never before—this is going to be a feast.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Grab the colorful plates, today we're going for a cheerful vibe.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: If the cake tastes as good as it smells, we're going to enjoy it without holding back!

meaning: Contraction spasmodique du diaphragme produisant un appel d'air sonore ; bruit qui en résulte.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I tell everyone I'm unbeatable at quizzes... and then, in front of the whole family, *[hiccup]*... total embarrassment, can you imagine!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: That's so typical of you—drawing attention without warning!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I swear, Mom was laughing so hard she almost forgot the next question.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With a scene like that, you become the undisputed star of the living room.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I think even the cat was wondering what was going on...

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Next time, maybe you should wear a stage costume, just in case!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Hey, did you see the size of the cake they brought out at the break? It looked like they wanted to feed the whole building!

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: I thought they were bringing enough for three weeks! Admit it, you took two slices.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: You know me well, but it was just to taste both flavors... Purely scientific.

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: Yeah, yeah, blame it on science... But you didn't hold back with the chocolate mousse either!

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Oh, careful, you're going to end up exploding if you keep swallowing that fast.

dialogue.speaker: Amine
dialogue.text: Ouch— [hiccup]— see, too late... It's your fault with your giant cake stories!

meaning: Exclamation qui exprime le plaisir de manger.
Chose à manger.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: My stomach is doing a tap dance, we need something comforting!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Well, you’ve come at the perfect time, I have an irresistible craving for raclette.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: Great choice! I’ll get the cheese and potatoes, can you take care of the cold cuts?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Perfect, and I’ll grab the pickles too, they’re essential for my happiness.

dialogue.speaker: Lea
dialogue.text: The first batch is ready, careful, it’s piping hot!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Oh wow... [yum], this melty combination is just incredible!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: This strawberry tart looks so appetizing, don’t you think?

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: I admit, it’s been catching my eye ever since they put it on the table.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: How about we share the first bite? I have a feeling we’re going to love it.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: I’ll let you take the spoon—tell me what you think!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: [yum], the cream is so smooth and the strawberries are super sweet...

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: You’re making me want it even more—my turn to try it now!

meaning: Exclamation enfantine renforçant une affirmation ou une négation.

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Look, I built a tower with all the blocks without it falling even once!

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: No way, last time it collapsed right before the end!

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Nope, this time it was super steady, [ha]!

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: You little cheater, you must have glued it together with some secret trick!

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Not even, you can check, all the pieces move!

dialogue.speaker: Max
dialogue.text: In that case, next time I’ll build it even higher, deal!

dialogue.speaker: Lina
dialogue.text: Look, I’m the one who found the bean under the napkin!

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: Not at all, you didn’t have the right piece, I saw where it was hidden.

dialogue.speaker: Lina
dialogue.text: Yes I did, I saw everything from the start, [hah]!

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: You’re really playing the queen of suspense, it’s crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Lina
dialogue.text: We’ll see who wears the crown in a bit.

dialogue.speaker: Mathis
dialogue.text: Get your speech ready, the party isn’t won for you yet!

meaning: Interjection de surprise, d'admiration, ou renforçant l'expression d'un sentiment.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: [wow] but look, they've hung a huge mural on the theater's facade!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Incredible, I didn't expect to see so many colors on this street.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: It's amazing how it changes the atmosphere, it feels like a completely different place.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Do you think we can get closer to see the details up close?

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Of course, and there's probably a plaque that explains the project.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Let's go decipher it, it might be just as fascinating as the mural itself!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Tell me, how was that famous concert last night? I want all the details!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It was incredible. The atmosphere was electric and the stage was bathed in colorful lights, it was almost unreal.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Did you have a favorite song?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Yes, when they played their last song, everyone sang along in unison, it was magical.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [wow], that must have really been a breathtaking moment!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: You can't even imagine, I had chills the whole encore.

meaning: bruit du cri du chien.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: [woof-woof], that reminds me of when I was little and we used to race with the dogs barking behind the gates.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: It's true, it always added a bit of suspense to our neighborhood walks!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: And do you remember how we sped up when we passed the yellow house?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Impossible to forget, especially the day I almost lost my shoe jumping over the puddle.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: That's a story to tell at our next picnic with the old neighbors.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Alright, but this time, without the impromptu sprint!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: It looks like even the birds are sleeping in today.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: That's true, everything is so peaceful that I almost want to fall asleep on this bench.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Oh, wait a second, I thought I noticed something by the gate.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Maybe it's just the wind or a leaf moving…

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: No, listen closely, it just went '[woof-woof]' behind the hedge!

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Well, it seems like someone doesn't want us to forget they're around the neighborhood.

meaning: Exprime la surprise, une mise en garde.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Tonight, I have to prepare dinner for eight people, and I don't even know where to start!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Eight? Just like that? Looks like you're already aiming for the home chef title.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: It was my mother-in-law who suggested inviting everyone, and she has high expectations for this meal...

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: You're being brave! Do you already have an idea for the menu or are you improvising?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [whoa], if you saw the mess in my kitchen, you'd understand I'm far from having everything under control!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: I can picture it... I promise, if you survive tonight, I'll take you out to a restaurant tomorrow to celebrate.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: If you only knew, I agreed to look after the neighbor's dog this weekend even though I barely know anything about dogs.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: [whoa], that's going to be a workout! I heard he loves running all over the apartment.

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: On top of that, he's got energy to spare—I'm going to end up running a marathon in my living room.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: Make sure to put all your cushions up high, or they won't last the day!

dialogue.speaker: Lucy
dialogue.text: I swear, I'm going to turn my place into a real anti-dog fortress.

dialogue.speaker: Julian
dialogue.text: At least you won't get bored, that's for sure!

meaning: Cri d'enthousiasme, d'acclamation.

dialogue.speaker: Julie
dialogue.text: This concert was way beyond my expectations, don’t you think?

dialogue.speaker: Olivier
dialogue.text: Absolutely, I still have chills! The finale was perfect.

dialogue.speaker: Julie
dialogue.text: When they played that legendary song, I thought the whole audience was going to take off!

dialogue.speaker: Olivier
dialogue.text: [hooray]! The audience literally vibrated from one end of the hall to the other.

dialogue.speaker: Julie
dialogue.text: An evening like this definitely deserves a stop at Marcel’s for some ice cream, right?

dialogue.speaker: Olivier
dialogue.text: I vote yes, there’s no way I can come down after all that energy!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: Look, it's the last minute, the suspense is unbearable!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: [hooray]! He scored, this is absolutely crazy!

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: That turnaround, I can't believe it!

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: We're going to be talking about this for weeks, that's for sure.

dialogue.speaker: Nadia
dialogue.text: I hope they keep up this energy until the end of the tournament.

dialogue.speaker: Yann
dialogue.text: With moments like this, they can aim for the final victory no problem!

meaning: Appeler en criant, en sifflant.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: He slipped away like a shadow between the trees, it's incredible... Do you think we'll manage to find that rascal again?

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: With our luck, he's probably already perched at the top of an oak tree or hiding in a bush. But he can't be too far.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Do you remember the last time he disappeared for half an hour? I'm starting to get used to it, but it still stresses me out.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Wait, I'll try to [yoo-hoo], he often reacts to that when he's playing hide and seek.

dialogue.speaker: Camille
dialogue.text: Go ahead, show me what you've got, maybe he'll come out of his den.

dialogue.speaker: Julien
dialogue.text: Get ready to see him come running, he never lets us catch him unless he decides to!

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Hey, where did Leo go? I don't see him anywhere around the playground.

dialogue.speaker: Éric
dialogue.text: He was running straight ahead earlier, I lost sight of him near the swings.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Oh wow, with all his energy, he could have flown all the way to those trees over there!

dialogue.speaker: Éric
dialogue.text: Yeah, I'll take a look behind the playhouse, maybe he's hiding there quietly.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Otherwise, we could try to [yoo-hoo], he often responds when we do that.

dialogue.speaker: Éric
dialogue.text: Great idea, come on, let's give it a loud try together, it'll make him smile if he hears us!

meaning: Pousser des cris de dérision, des cris hostiles contre (qqn).
Pousser son cri, en parlant de la chouette, du hibou.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: Well, I’ve never seen such an electric atmosphere in the stands as tonight.

dialogue.speaker: Amina
dialogue.text: When Lemaire came up to the corner right at the end, did you hear how it started to [boo] behind us? It was deafening.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: I almost got goosebumps, the whole stadium was buzzing at that moment.

dialogue.speaker: Amina
dialogue.text: Sometimes I feel like the fans live every play as if it were a matter of life or death.

dialogue.speaker: Nicolas
dialogue.text: You have to admit, the intensity goes up a notch every time we get close to the decisive score.

dialogue.speaker: Amina
dialogue.text: We’re definitely not going to forget this match anytime soon, that’s for sure!

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: Clara, you won't believe this: at the match tonight, as soon as the referee blew the whistle for the penalty, the whole stadium started [booing], it was absolutely wild!

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Wow, the intensity must have been at its peak, the stands must have been shaking!

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: You can't even imagine, you could feel the tension everywhere, the fans were totally into it.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: That reminds me of that famous derby last year, the emotions were just as electric.

dialogue.speaker: Sebastian
dialogue.text: Exactly, that's why we love nights like this, there's always a surprise waiting.

dialogue.speaker: Clara
dialogue.text: Nothing like it to get the adrenaline pumping, we'll be talking about this one for a long time!

meaning: Onomatopée qui évoque le fredonnement.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: So Louis, you see, just the smell of basil makes me want to hum a tune!

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: It's true that as soon as there are fresh herbs, your kitchen turns festive.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: I can't help it, hearing the pan sizzle and mixing everything puts me in a good mood.

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: My sister used to do the same when we cooked together—it makes everything feel more lively.

dialogue.speaker: Claire
dialogue.text: Careful, if you stay here, you'll end up joining in without even realizing it!

dialogue.speaker: Louis
dialogue.text: It's already too late, look: [la, la, la], and I'm stirring the sauce like a chef!

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: Look at that light in the living room, it feels like spring is already inviting itself into our home!

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: It's true, it makes me want to open all the windows and move the furniture around to change up the atmosphere a bit.

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: If we reorganize a little, I bet we might even find the old record player.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Oh, you want to bring out our vinyls from when you used to spend your Sundays dancing in the room?

dialogue.speaker: Sophie
dialogue.text: [la, la, la]... I can already feel the music tickling my feet.

dialogue.speaker: Mathieu
dialogue.text: Careful, with you, the party always starts without warning!
